text: One Evening After the War (French: Un soir après la guerre, Khmer: រាត្រីមួយក្រោយសង្គ្រាម) is a 1998 Cambodian French Belgian Swiss drama movie directed by Rithy Panh and starring Peng Phan, Chea Lyda Chan, Narith Roeun, Ratha Keo. ==Other websites== * * Category:1998 drama movies Category:Cambodian movies Category:French drama movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:Swiss drama movies Category:Movies directed by Rithy Panh
title: One Evening After the War
